name: Toxic Triangles
description:
Play as a neon geometric shape and avoid the incoming "toxic triangles"! How long can you last?

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Dash

P - Pause

R - Restart game (for now, you must die to be able to restart the game)

Credits:

Programming, Level Design, Art, SFX by BoneD4 (me) 

"BIG BEAT ROCK POP LOUNGE 80S RETRO SYNTHESIZER BACKGROUND MUSIC" by Royalty Free Music (licensed under CC BY-NC-ND)

"synthwave.wav" by Suburbanwizard (licensed under CC0)

"Steam - steam from water on hot surface.wav" by DamianMinnie (licensed under CC BY-NC)

Installation Guide: 

Download   ->   Put in a New Folder   ->   Extract   ->   Enjoy

My first game. Wohoo!
